properties.areaDesc: Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 1 at 5:30PM AKST until March 3 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Plan on difficult
travel conditions. Storm total snow accumulations of 2 to 4
inches, are expected. Visibility will be reduced to one half
mile or less at times along the Alaska Highway.

* WHERE...Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country.

* WHEN...6 AM Monday to 6 AM Tuesday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will develop Monday morning and
continue through Tuesday morning. Northwest winds gusting to
35 mph along with low visibility in blowing snow will develop
along the Alaska Highway Monday afternoon and continue into
Tuesday morning. Heavy drifting snow will develop along the
Alaska Highway Monday afternoon through Tuesday morning.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be
obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MONDAY TO 6 AM AKST TUESDAY
